CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.8, drugadministrationroute (3N)
E2B (R3): G.k.4.r.10.1 Route of Administration (free text) Conformance: Optional Data Type: 60 AN OID: None Value Allowed: Free text nullFlavor: ASKU, NASK, UNK
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For a parent-child or parent-fetus report, this indicates the route of administration of a drug given to the child or fetus. This is usually an indirect exposure, such as transmammary, but can include more usual routes of administration.
CustomField.label: Route of Administration
